channel.title: Working run for CreativeScape client?
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering if anyone had a working run for the creativescape client?
These are the ones i've tried: [code]@echo off TITLE Run "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m client highmem pause[/code] [code]@echo off color 81 cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32 exit[/code]
and a few others. My jdk version is 1.6.0_24
Thanks in advance. :)

item.title: Working run for CreativeScape client?
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Nope, didn’t work.

item.title: Working run for CreativeScape client?
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Hey, I was wondering if anyone had a working run for the creativescape client?

These are the ones i’ve tried:

@echo off TITLE Run "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m client highmem pause

@echo off color 81 cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32 exit

and a few others. My jdk version is 1.6.0_24

Thanks in advance.
